title: Tapilintu / Akki roti / Rice flour roti
content:
Ingredients: Rice flour - 1 cup Finely chopped onion - 1 cup Grated carrots - 1/2 cup Finely chopped - Green chillies - 4 Jeera/ Cumin seeds - 1 tb sp Sesame seeds - 1/2 tb sp Roasted peanuts powder - coarse - 3 tb sp Coriander - 1/2 cup Soaked Bengal gram - 1 tb sp Salt - as per taste Curry leaves chopped - 4 to 5 Ghee/ Butter/ Oil - To fry Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients except ghee/ butter/ oil in a medium sized bowl
  • Mix all together with adding water
  • Dont add so much of water. Add sufficient water to make perfect non sticky dough
  • Divide dough into equal parts
  • Make lemon size balls
  • On butter paper / plastic wrapper add oil and spread all over
  • Keep a ball on it and press with hand ðŸ¤šÂ equally and form circle shape.
  • Make a hole in middle of roti
  • Medium heated frying pan with oil
  • Take out the roti with hands and flip it on pan carefully
  • Apply oil
  • Close with lid
  • Dont cook top of the roti
  • Take out roti's when it cooked completely with brown dots and nice aroma
  • Serve it hot @ Morning - Breakfast/ Evening - snack with ghee/ Raw onion chopped/ Curd
  • Enjoy your day ðŸ˜„
